verses.roman:
chayera chaya mata vyāsa kailā āvartana
sei saba sūtra lañā 'vedānta'-varṇana

synonyms: chayera—of the six philosophers; chaya mata—six different theses; vyāsa—Vyāsadeva; kailā āvartana—analyzed fully; sei—that; saba—all; sūtra—the codes; lañā—taking; vedānta-varṇana—explaining the Vedānta philosophy.
translation: "After studying the six philosophical theses, Vyāsadeva completely summarized them all in the codes of Vedānta philosophy.
